summary:
scikit-learn is an awesome tool allowing developers with little or no
machine learning knowledge to predict the future! But once you've
trained a scikit-learn algorithm, what now? In this talk, I describe how
to deploy a predictive model in a production environment using
scikit-learn and RabbitMQ. You'll see a realtime content classification
system to demonstrate this design.
title: Realtime predictive analytics using scikit-learn & RabbitMQ
